> <OLD>
>
> Windlord Looked to Rattrap and said =93If you are ready to go d=
own  and have
some fun I=92m ready to=94
>
> Rat Trap looks around. He appe=
ars highly lost as to where he is.
>
> "This doesn't look familliar Windlor=
d. It's like this whole place got a
major face lift. Now what? I dunno wher=
e anything is from the last time I
was here... This ain't gonna be easy... =
I'll have ta relearn this place all
over again."

<NEW>

The hallway inside=
 is well lit, a light emitting strip extends the full
length of the hall on=
 both sides, illuminating the passage way in bright
slightly purple tinted =
light, giving the place a grim and forbidding look.
The walls appear to be =
made of thick metal, buttressed every 10 feet by
support beams that are att=
ached directly to each wall; they run up the wall
from floor to ceiling. Th=
ere are no windows in this hall, only three doors
are visible - One at eith=
er end  of the hall and one towards the middle.
There is of course still th=
e small hole above that allowed Rat Trap and
Windlord to enter, a small bit=
 of light streams in from the outside from it.

The doors on either end of =
the hall each have a control panel attached to
them. Rat Trap does notice a=
 small camera above each door as well, a small
red light above them, indica=
ting they were on and observing.


> <OLD>
>
> =93Send some Predacons to in=
spect the breach if a Maximal is there Kill on
sight=94said

<NEW>

=93Of c=
ourse.=94 Cyclonus replied to Hydras. =93I will dispatch Scourge to locate
=
who ever is trying to get in; He is the only one left inside now besides
my=
self.=94

Cyclonus closed the channel, although for a moment Hydras could b=
e heard
giving orders to Scourge to find and eliminate the threat as the ch=
annel
went quiet.

> <OLD>
>
> Talon Look with sorrow How the Battle starte=
d and before she could move to
help Tucson Kup took her arm and said =93The=
 only way we can help Tucson is
keeping the PRedacon horde away of him, if =
things goes ugly we will rescue
Tucson and retreat=94
>
> After that He ope=
ned fire against the nearest Predacons

< . . . MEANWHILE . . . >

>   Hydr=
as then laughted one of his evils tone and replied to Tucson =93Then
let=92=
s start=94. After he had said those words  arrived to the Point where
Tucso=
n were and transforming to his beast form he spread the Hydras heads
toward=
s Tucson.

> Where Tucson is located, he could sense that enemies were appr=
oaching, yet
he is not afraid to face them. As Straight Shot meets up with =
him, she turns
to Kup and Night Shift.
>
> "Kup, I gotta rejoin Tucson for =
a while, I think he needs me. But you did
a fantastic job, and I'll be more=
 than honored ta rejoin ya after this is
all said'n done."
>
> She now leap=
s up into Tucson's hand, as she quickly transforms into her
cross bow form.=

>
> "Ahh, glad to have you back, Straight Shot. Now, time to bring down a =
few
enemy jets."
>
> With Straight Shot in hand, the combination of their s=
kills combined,
augments the long range capabilities of Straight Shot's fir=
ing systems, as
she now links with Tucson, who is quick to use sonar to tak=
e aim at who is
above him. He now attempts to fire back at those firing at =
him.

<NEW>

So, the battle is joined in earnest now! Hydras and the vast m=
ajority of the
Predacons are flying in to take on the invading Maximal and =
Autobot assault
forces.

Hydras is back by several strong troops:

Deepstry=
ke is floating in his massive cannon mode, seeming constructed like
a float=
ing tank, his muzzle easily a meter or more in diameter, it began to
glow d=
angerously.

Phobia, an evil looking red and black jet flies over head comi=
ng around to
the right side of the Maximals and Autobots, her missiles prim=
ed to let
loose. Behind her are several sweeps, all seeming to follow her l=
ead, each
one of them invisible to sensors and ready to bring destruction t=
o anyone
who gets in their way!

Insecticon, Bruticus-X, Iguanus and Infern=
o are nearest to Hydras, seemingly
ready to what ever their master commands=
.

The Fuzors: Skyshadow, Injector, Buzzclaw, Terrorgator, and Quickstrike
=
quickly exit the shuttle as well and make their way towards the left side o=
f
the invading party, the menace in their optics apparent.

Lastly Terrorsa=
ur and Waspinator fly around towards the rear of the
Maximals!

All of this=
 movement is in an obvious attempt to box in the Maximals, traps
them in an=
d eliminate them!

It is obvious now that the Maximals and Autobots are ind=
eed outnumbered with
these new entrants entering the fray, and they will qu=
ickly be surrounded if
they do not do something fast!

> <OLD>
>
> Back at =
the Ark, Quickstride salutes Rodimus and now brings up special
tracking equ=
ipment, to better prepare himself for what could be lurking
around at the A=
rk. Now on high alert, he leaves nothing to chance.
>
> " Don't worry Rodim=
us, we'll be just fine. Hopefully we all will be just
fine. But no piece of=
 ninja scrap's gonna get past me! I better go ta beast
mode, my senses are =
a lot stronger in my horse form."
>
> He transforms into his beast form, an=
d keeps his haunch cannons on alert,
while using his ears, and nostrills to=
 pick up scent and sound.
> He appears angry at the dagger which had been s=
tuck in the dirt, and paws
at the ground with strong force, enough to crack=
 the ground and churn up
some dirt.
>
> " The moment that predicreep shows =
his face, I'm gonna put my hooves right
through his cranium!"
>

<NEW>

=93=
Good, you keep watch!=94 Rodimus continued to move and he is quickly lost
f=
rom Quickstride=92s sight. However over the radio Quickstride can easily he=
ar
a call from Rodimus Prime. =93AUTOBOTS, MAXIMALS! TUSCON NEEDS US!=94 he=
 calls
out over his radio to any available Maximal or Autobot, =93He is att=
acking
Hydras=92 tower. We need anyone who can come to his aid!=94

Rodimus=
 continues to drive towards Tuson's location, he had a bad feeling
about th=
is. That this was going to get ugly, he thought, and ugly really
fast.

(TA=
G)

Preston
